Question
========

A person achieves a score of 8 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 3 with a standard deviation 2.1. The z-score of the person with 8 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 1.46
* 1.58
* 2.38

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.46: Incorrect
* 1.58: Incorrect
* 2.38: Correct
